name: Robo Rythm
description:
New from Palingenesis Games, Robo Rythm.

A new game featuring completely moddable tracks, that's right YOU and the COMMUNITY create levels and share them with everyone (in my discord).

Gameplay is similar to rhythm games like Taiko no Tatsujin, but instead of a meter to fill, you have lives, get good combos to get more lives.

---------------

THIS IS AN EARLY BUILD, MUCH IS TO CHANGE/BE IMPROVED, AND YOUR FEEDBACK WILL HELP.
